modules.description: This module provides operations for compiling regular expressions with customizable flags, executing matches with support for capturing groups and named substrings, and manipulating strings through substitution, splitting, and advanced transformation. It operates on strings, compiled regular expressions, and match result structures that encapsulate captured substrings, metadata, and substitution templates. These features are commonly applied in text parsing, data extraction from logs or structured documents, and complex string manipulation tasks requiring precise pattern matching and transformation.
